description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) for TASK-BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS)The Department of National Defence (DND), specifically ADM (DIA), requires on an as and when requested basis one Information Management Architect (Level 3) to develop a Data Architecture Framework, and one Information Management Architect (Level 3) to develop a Data Standards Repository for the Department of National Defence (DND) \/ Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).
full_summary:
Procurement Notice for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)
=====================================

**Notice ID (title en):** PW-22-01015065
**Notice ID (title fr):** PW-22-01015065
**Publication Date:** 29 November 2022
**Closing Date:** 12 January 2023

**Introduction:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) provider to offer expert information management services. This requirement is open to qualified suppliers under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement.

**Description of Services:**

* Develop a Data Architecture Framework
* Develop a Data Standards Repository

**Scope:**

* Level of Effort: 240 days per resource
* Contract Duration: approximately one year from contract award, plus one six-month option period
* Delivery: as and when requested

**Trade Agreements:**

* WTO-AGP
* CCFTA
* CPFTA
* CKFTA
* CETA
* ALECP
* ACCH
* ALECC
* ALEC

**Security Clearances:**

* Common PS SRCL #22 applies
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: FSC Secret
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Resource 1: RELIABILITY; Resource 2: SECRET

**Invitation to Bid:**
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 2Keys Corporation
* A Hundred Answers Inc.
* Accenture Inc.
* ...
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.
* Vurtur Communications Group

**Contracting Authority:**

* Name: Benoit Plisson
* Email: benoit.plisson@forces.gc.ca
* Enquiries should be submitted to the Contracting Authority

**Additional Information:**

* TBIPS Supply Arrangement: qualified suppliers may not have been invited to bid
* Interested in learning more about becoming a qualified supplier? Contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca

**Important Notes:**
* This requirement is open only to qualified suppliers under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement.
* Bidders are advised that “Buy and Sell.GC.CA” is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language.
* This TBIPS requirement refreshes three (3) times per year.
* Contact RCNMD
